meanings.definition: A young woman making her debut in society.
meanings.sent1: The subdebutantes looked elegant in their gowns at the ball.
meanings.sent2: The group of subdebutantes practiced their dance routines for the debutante ball.
meanings.sent3: The subdebutantes giggled nervously as they practiced their curtsies.
meanings.sent4: The subdebutantes were like blooming flowers, each one unique and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The image of the subdebutantes in their white dresses lingered in his mind.

meanings.definition: A group of young women making their debut in society.
meanings.sent1: The elegant subdebutantes captivated the guests at the ball.
meanings.sent2: The subdebutantes' families were proud to see them presented to society.
meanings.sent3: The subdebutantes shared excited whispers as they awaited their turn.
meanings.sent4: The subdebutantes stood out like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The ballroom buzzed with excitement as the subdebutantes entered.

meanings.definition: The period of time during which young women make their debut in society.
meanings.sent1: The subdebutantes' season was filled with events and social gatherings.
meanings.sent2: During the subdebutantes' season, many families hosted elegant parties.
meanings.sent3: The subdebutantes' season seemed to pass by in a whirlwind of excitement.
meanings.sent4: The subdebutantes' season was like a beautiful chapter in their lives.
meanings.sent5: The memories of the subdebutantes' season would always hold a special place in their hearts.
